mapper.insert: insert into movie(movie_name, genre, actor, running_time, supervisor, opening_date, updated_at, created_at) values (#{movieName}, #{genre}, #{actor}, #{runningTime},#{supervisor}, #{openingDate}, current_timestamp , current_timestamp)
mapper.select: select count (*) from movie where opening_date between DATE_ADD (NOW(), interval -1 week) and NOW()

select movie.id, movie.movie_name, movie.genre, movie.actor, movie.running_time, movie.supervisor, movie.opening_date, poster.save_file_path from movie left join poster on movie.id = poster.movie_id order by movie.id Desc limit #{startIdx}, #{moviePerPage}
